tool_description: Indian Pincode or Postal code API provides the 29 states and seven territories pincodes data with latitude and longitude details. You can get the nearby area of pincodes, pincodes by districts, distances between two pincodes, nearby area and distance between pincodes by latitude and longitude information. There are 20k pincodes data available in this API.
name: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude
title: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude
tool_name: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude

api_list.name: PincodeDetails
api_list.description: The Pincode details including area name, state, latitude and longitude.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pincode/600001"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pincode/{pincode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetDistricts
api_list.description: Get all the districts of the Indian states

api_list.name: DistrictofaPincode

api_list.name: ValidatePincode
api_list.description: This api validates the given Pincode and returns true or false.
